user.title: Set up Fado
user.description: This integration provides smooth light fading for brightness and colors with automatic brightness restoration.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.

data_description.min_step_delay_ms: The lower this value (in milliseconds), the shorter the pause between each brightness step change and thus the smoother the transition, but too low values may cause transitions to last longer than expected and put unnecessary load on Home Assistant. (Default 100ms, minimum 50ms)

fado.name: Fade lights
fado.description: Fades lights to a desired brightness and/or color over a specified transition period.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness percentage
brightness_pct.description: Target brightness level as a percentage (0-100).

transition.name: Transition time
transition.description: Transition time for fading in seconds. Accepts decimal values, e.g., 0.5 for 500ms (default 3).

hs_color.name: HS color
hs_color.description: Target color as [hue, saturation]. Hue is 0-360, saturation is 0-100.

rgb_color.name: RGB color
rgb_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue]. Each value is 0-255.

rgbw_color.name: RGBW color
rgbw_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue, white]. Each value is 0-255.

rgbww_color.name: RGBWW color
rgbww_color.description: Target color as [red, green, blue, cold_white, warm_white]. Each value is 0-255.

xy_color.name: XY color
xy_color.description: Target color as [x, y]. Each value is 0-1.

from.name: Starting values
from.description: Optional starting values to override the current light state. Supports brightness_pct and all color parameters.
